text: <@U231ZGXDG> and anyone else trying to interface with mktplace without using the provided python client the update model for mktplace has changed. Each Transaction doesn’t have an Update, but now has an Updates array. Inside the Updates array, there is a hash where one key must be ‘UpdateType’. The UpdateTypes are specified in the mktplace/transactions/* files and for example to register a participant the UpdateType would be ‘RegisterParticipant’ or to register an assettype the UpdateType is ‘RegisterAssetType’. If there are any questions on mktplace, just ping me on slack or post here.
<@U26PBUZRT|kiko3333> uploaded a file: <https://hyperledgerproject.slack.com/files/kiko3333/F2HJPGEAW/error_in_the_extension_marketplace.txt|Error in the extension MarketPlace>
